headline: Simon® Announces New $2.0 Billion Common Stock Repurchase Program
summary: Simon®, a real estate investment trust engaged in the ownership of premier shopping, dining, entertainment and mixed-use destinations, today announced that the Company's Board of Directors authorized a new common stock repurchase program. Under the new program, the Company may purchase up to $2.0 billion of its common stock through February 29, 2028, as market conditions warrant. The shares may be repurchased in the open market or in privately negotiated transactions, at prices that the Company

headline: Simon Property Group Announces Appointment of Martin J. Cicco to Board of Directors
summary: Simon®, a real estate investment trust engaged in the ownership of premier shopping, dining, entertainment and mixed-use destinations, announced today that Martin J. Cicco has been appointed to the Board of Directors.

headline: 3 Intriguing Stocks to Watch After Q4 Earnings: AMD, SPG, TER
summary: These top-rated stocks have been suitable candidates for the portfolio and are certainly going to draw investors' interest after their favorable Q4 results.
